translation.text:
Buses are replacing trains between Mt Victoria, Lithgow and Bathurst in both directions due to infrastructure damage caused by bushfires. 

There is no forecast when the line can reopen. Please allow additional travel time and check transport apps for further details.
Be weather wise and avoid rushing and stepping in puddles to prevent slips, trips and falls.

Illawarra Folk Festival 2020 - Bulli Showgrounds, Bulli
From 09:00 until 24:00
- The closest station to the festival is Bulli on South Coast Line which is a short walk from the Showgrounds. 
- A free shuttle bus will run between the station and showgrounds from 8:00 to 10:00 and from 17:00 to 19:00.

Details: https://transportnsw.info/events/2020/01/illawarra-folk-festival-2020

This train will consist of 8 cars instead of 4 today due to a freight train with mechanical problems at Gosford earlier.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and the concourse is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, ask staff or phone 9847 8496.
The lift between platform 1 and Constitution Road is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9752 8460.
The lift between the concourse and street The Kingsway is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9848 9151.
The lift between the concourse and Denham Avenue is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9522 1265.
The lift between platform 1 and Railway Pde is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4223 5576.
The lift between the concourse and Plough Inn Road is temporarily out of service. For assistance, ask staff or call 4625 2362.
The lift between the concourse and Railway Street is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9851 7243.
The lift between the concourse and the street is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, ask staff or phone 4782 1902.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and concourse is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, ask staff or phone 4782 1902.

From Thursday 2 until Saturday 25 January, the Southern Tunnel at Central Station will be temporarily closed due to Sydney Metro works. To access platforms 4-23 please follow signs and use the Suburban Tunnel or the Northern Concourse. For more information about Sydney Metro works, visit sydneymetro.info

Due to power supply issues affecting station infrastructure there is currently no power at Valley Heights station. Opal machines are affected. Customers are advised to request a fare adjustment at transportnsw.info/opal.

The public toilets at St James Station are closed while major works are taking place. Public toilets are located at the Elizabeth Street entrance to the right and in Hyde Park through the Macquarie Street tunnel up the stairs to the right. We apologise for any inconvenience.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
